items.title: Aid convoys resume after security clearance in northern Afghanistan
items.description: Humanitarian convoys have resumed in northern Afghanistan following a temporary suspension due to security concerns. Officials report safe passage has been established along the main relief corridor.

items.title: Explosion rocks central Kabul market, casualties reported
items.description: An explosion struck a crowded market in central Kabul, causing multiple casualties and prompting temporary security lockdowns in surrounding districts. Emergency services and local security forces are on site.

items.title: Bridge collapse cuts key supply route in northern Afghanistan
items.description: A roadway bridge along the Mazarâ??Kunduz corridor collapsed after overnight flooding, halting commercial traffic and delaying humanitarian deliveries. Local authorities report temporary diversions but warn of multi-day disruptions.
